DATUM DPL5 PLUS LINE LASER

DATUM DPL5 PLUS LINE LASER

The Datum DPL5+ Cross Line Laser produces two bright red horizontal and vertical laser line beams for alignment work, as well as 5 spot beams for setting out 90 Degree angles quickly and easily.

With a built-in compensator, the DPL5+ quickly and accurately self levels automatically for operation with a single button and all functions easily selectable using only two buttons.

The DPL5+ is a Pulse Beam instrument that can be used externally with the Datum Pulse Laser Detector included in the kit for a working range as far as 120m.

£2,350.00
1
Description

Reviews (0)

Description

The Datum DPL5+ Cross Line Laser produces two bright red vertical and horizontal laser line beams for alignment work, as well as 5 spot beams for setting out 90 Degree angles easily and quickly.

These spot beams can be used in conjunction with the horizontal and vertical line alignment beams if required.

With a built-in compensator, the DPL5+ accurately and quickly self levels automatically for operation with a single button and all functions easily selectable using only two buttons.

The DPL5+ is a Pulse Beam instrument that can be used externally with the Datum Pulse Laser Detector included in the kit for a working range as far as 120m.

Kit includes:

  • DPL5+
  • Magnetic Mount
  • Laser Glasses
  • Detector
  • Clamp
  • Mini Tripod and 360° Trivet
  • Carry Case

Features

  • Class II Laser Diodes
  • One Button Operation
  • Built in Compensator
  • Highly Visible Vertical and Horizontal Beams
  • Five Spot Beam Option
  • 10m Range with Laser, 120m Range with Pulsed Detector
  • Used Internally or Externally
  • Up to 20 Hours Operation Time with Alkaline Batteries
  • +/-1mm per 3m
  • Datum 2 Year Warranty
